long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Time Calculator, the Chrome extension that helps you manage your time effectively.

Key Features:

Real-time Time Tracking: Keep a close eye on your task's progress.

Timely Alerts: Get notified when your allotted time is up.

Customizable Time Limits: Set personalized time limits for various activities

Effortless Integration: Seamlessly integrate Time Calculator into your Chrome browser for a hassle-free experience.

With Time Calculator, you'll never lose track of time again. Download now and make the most of every minute!
